Author: jcsxx
Text: My friend covered her mirrors and I think that made a really big difference for her and enabled her to make a step forward

Author: hanimallover
Text: Get rid of the scale and try to connect with nature again. That really seemed to help you. Iâ€™m sort of jealous. Maybe I should try and find a therapeutic getaway. I was also considering covering up my mirrors. Sounds ridiculous but it stops me from getting triggered.
